title: Asian Noodle Salad with Creamy Peanut Dressing
ingredients: 2 tablespoons warm water (more as needed to thin dressing)
directions: Start by cooking the rice noodles according to package directions. /p While the pasta cooks, prepare the vegetables and make the dressing.  /p To make the dressing, add the almond butter, soy sauce, honey, rice vinegar, Sriracha, garlic, and water to a blender. Blend until smooth, adding more warm water if needed. Taste and adjust as needed. /p Toss the noodles and vegetables with the dressing. /p Serving size: 1/4 of total yield , about 1.5 of cups /p Calories: 276/serving
